attributes.action: Keep it fair: no retroactive settlement rules for Skilled Workers.
attributes.additional_details: Applying new 10–15 year settlement rules to people already part-way through the 5-year Skilled Worker pathway is unfair and destabilising. Migrants relied on clear Home Office rules when planning their lives and families. Changing requirements mid-route undermines trust, creates hardship and harms the UK’s reputation. Transitional protection is essential for fairness and legal certainty.
attributes.background: Ensure Skilled Worker visa holders already in the UK can complete their promised 5-year ILR pathway under the current rules, with no retroactive extensions or recalculations to their qualifying period when new settlement rules take effect.

rejection.details:
Your petition is in essence a duplicate of this petition, which you may wish to sign instead:

Make a law to protect ILR from abolition and retrospective changes
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/742864
